name: base-lol
description: Encodes/decodes binary data as a sequence of emojis.

scripts.demo: ./base-lol-bin base-lol-node.mjs < targets/max-tiny.jpg > tmp/demo.base-lol; head -c 20 tmp/demo.base-lol; ./base-lol-bin base-lol-node.mjs --decode < tmp/demo.base-lol > tmp/demo-decoded.jpg; diff tmp/demo-decoded.jpg targets/max-tiny.jpg
